description:
Iruma had finally started getting used to his life in the netherworld. As he continues having fun with his classmate, he begins to wonder if he should really be allowed to stay in the netherworld. Seeing that Iruma seems troubled, Asmodeus and Clara decide to cook for him.  But Clara’s mother’s recipe is filled with items that even Asmodeus doesn’t know about. The two end up having a cooking competition. Which dish will Iruma choose?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tu as trouvé ta place en enfer, Iruma !
You Fit Right In Now, Iruma-kun
馴染みました! 入間くん
